xocs:funding-list.xocs:funding-text: ACKNOWLEDGEMENT This work was supported in part by the Guangzhou Science and Technology Project under Grant No.202102080656, and in part by 2021 the ordinary university key research platform and projects of Guangdong (No.2021ZDZX1047).

head.citation-title: Singular Value Decomposition Representation of Color Image Based on Quaternion Equivalent Complex Matrix
head.abstracts: Â© 2023 IEEE.Image representation is an active area in image processing. An excellent representation can often bring convenient solutions to problems, and give a greater insight into physical phenomena than is available by other methods. In this paper, we discuss a singular value decomposition representation of the color image, which is based on the quaternion equivalent complex matrix. In this scheme, three channels of a color image are considered to be three imaginary parts of one quaternion, and there is no splitting of the color image into three channel images. Then, the classical singular value decomposition are extended to the quaternion domain, so that the obtained quaternion of a color image can perform singular value decomposition. Experiments show that the method can preserve the essence of an original image well. In addition, some properties of this method are suitable for image compression and image water-marking.
